title: Awful ping when usually I'm at 60 ping
body: Is there a connection issue with certain ISP? my ping is awful today.

replies.body: Ping issues can be caused by different reasons and in various ways like how your ISP is routing to the game server.  I'd like to help, but I need more information.    What is your ping at exactly?  Is it sudden or random?  Is it consistently the same in-game?  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the matches these are happening in, and let me know the results.  I'll be around!

Pinging www.google.com [216.58.217.196] with 32 bytes of data:
